price: Или их потопи, због греха које су зарадили – а много тога Он и опрости,
arabic: أَوۡ يُوبِقۡهُنَّ بِمَا كَسَبُواْ وَيَعۡفُ عَن كَثِيرٖ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: aw yūbiq'hunna bimā kasabū wayaʿfu ʿan kathīrin
